title: Book, Recueil d'Ornemens, 1731–88
markings: Stamped on the first fly-leaf by the binder: "CANAPE."
inscribed: Recueil d' Ornemens a l'usage des jeunes artists qui se destinent a la decoration des batimens/Dedie a Monsieur/Par G.P. Cauvet Sculpteur de S.A.R./A Paris/Chez L'Auteur, rue de Seve, pres celle du Bacq./M.DCC.LXXVII
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Folio, 75 leaves. Leaf 1, title plate of a volume composed of a frontispiece. Dedication and 108 plates on 71 leaves, leaf with extract from the register of the Academie Royale d'Architecture, dated 28 July 1777, and the text of the Privilege du Roi, dated 3 September 1777.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book, Recueil d'Ornemens, 1731–88. 
Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-204
